content: General Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 22 Oct 2018What are some of the best investment courses you have been to and which will you recommend for beginners?Investment courses recommendations. preferably local and also affordable (less than 1k)3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Oct 2018You don't need courses when you have Seedly articles to read!Alternatively, do consider Dr Wealth courses. Can't say they are all good because I've only been to the REITs foundation course, but the REITs course is pretty good; very well paced with sufficient knowledge to get you started!0 comments0

Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Oct 2018REITs foundation course by Dr Wealth. The lecturer is very experienced and the lesson is well paced. Highly recommended to anyone who has no knowledge of REITS. 0 comments0
Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Oct 2018Google is pretty good. Free excluding device, internet and electricity. 0 comments0
